chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : DTA) (t : term), DTA_ref_ok d -> reconnait d t <-> reconnait (dta_kill_non_coacc d) t

Premises:
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
dta_kill_non_coacc = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => dta (predta_kill_non_coacc p a) a end : DTA -> DTA
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
rec_co : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance_co d a a t
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
rec_co_rec : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> reconnaissance d a t
predta_kill_non_coacc_dir : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (non_coacc_kill d (predta_coacc_states d a)) a t
dta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true
dta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d
rec_nonco_kill : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance_co (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a a0 t
rec_co_def_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a1 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a1 t -> Prop
rec_co_rec_def_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> Prop
rec_nonco_kill_def_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> Prop
rec_co_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a1 t -> coacc d a0 a1 -> reconnaissance_co d a a0 t
rec_co_def_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a1 : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co d s a1 t -> Prop
rec_co_rec_def_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a0 : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co d s a0 t -> Prop
rec_nonco_kill_def_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a0 : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co d s a0 t -> Prop
term_occur_1 : forall (t : term_list) (u : term), term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_0 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop
predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_1 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop
reconnaissance_co_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> P d a b t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co p a a0 t -> P p a a0 t
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
state_reconnait_co_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c b : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait_co d l b tl -> P d s b (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) (t : term), state_reconnait_co p s a t -> P p s a t
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)

```coq
intros d t H_ok.
split.
- intro H_rec.
  rewrite <- (dta_kill_non_coacc_dir _ _ _ H_ok H_rec).
  apply rec_co_rec.
  apply rec_co.
  exact H_rec.
- intro H_rec_kill.
  apply rec_co_rec in H_rec_kill.
  apply rec_co in H_rec_kill.
  rewrite (dta_kill_non_coacc_dir _ _ _ H_ok) in H_rec_kill.
  exact H_rec_kill.
Qed.
```

original: intros d t H_ok. split. - intro H_rec. rewrite <- (dta_kill_non_coacc_dir _ _ _ H_ok H_rec). apply rec_co_rec. apply rec_co. apply H_rec. - intro H_rec_kill. apply rec_co_rec in H_rec_kill. apply rec_co in H_rec_kill. rewrite (dta_kill_non_coacc_dir _ _ _ H_ok) in H_rec_kill. apply H_rec_kill.
